QueryResult.text: select v.id FILE_ID, f.name NAME, p.user_id USER_ID FROM cmn_sec_assgnd_obj_perm_v2 p, CLB_DMS_FILES f, CLB_DMS_VERSIONS v , CLB_DMS_WKF_V1 wkf WHERE p.object_id = 100 and p.permission_value = 1 and f.ID = p.object_instance_id and f.ID = v.file_id and v.ID = wkf.DOC_TYPE_ID UNION select v.id FILE_ID, f.name NAME , p.user_id USER_ID FROM clb_dms_area_perms_v p , CLB_DMS_FILES f , CLB_DMS_VERSIONS v , CLB_DMS_WKF_V1 wkf WHERE p.area_id = f.area_id and f.ID = v.file_id and v.ID = wkf.DOC_TYPE_ID
